column1: Berlin is the capital city of Germany and one of the 16 states of Germany.
column2: (r/+list (r/is berlin (r/+of capital_city germany)) (r/is berlin (r/+of one (r/+of 16_states germany))))

column1: With a population of 3 million people, Berlin is Germany's largest city and is the second most populous city proper and the seventh most populous urban area in the European Union.
column2: (r/+list (r/has berlin (r/+of population 3_million_people)) (r/is berlin (r/+poss germany (r/+prop city largest))) (r/is berlin (r/+in second_most_populous_city_proper european_union)) (r/is berlin (r/+in (r/+prop area seventh_most_populous_urban) european_union)))
